respStmt.name: Séverine bochatay, Adrien Coulon, Grégoire Gavin

sourceDesc.bibl: Argentine Ornithology, Volume 2 (of 2) by W. H. Hudson and Philip Lutley Sclater

argentine-ornithology.order:
MACROCHIRES

S.E. Brazil.

TOTANUS MELANOLEUCUS (Gm.).

NUMENIUS BOREALIS (Forst.).

LARUS MACULIPENNIS, Licht.
